name: Hungry Lizzy
description:
Control a little Lizard and catch as many catterpillar as you can before they evolve into butterflies.
P.S.: Game made for the ScoreSpace Jam #24

Team members:
- Bruno Machado (Me)
- Ana Luiza Daros
- Camila Rosa

Assets Used:
- Lootlocker's Leaderboard
- Sound effects and music from Pixabay and Youtube Studio's Music Library
